infos.value: Equipment can be enhanced with certain materials.
Your equipment has now become a little stronger. Next, let us equip it.
Units' equipment proficiency will increase for those equipped by doing battle.
Please strive to increase the proficiency of your enhanced equipment and thus increase your fighting capabilities.
I have prepared the necessary materials, so let us first try enhancing.
Let us try combining <color=#00ffff>Adamantite</color> with your base equipment.
An <color=#00ffff>equipment slot</color> for your formation has been unlocked. Now, we can prepare to <color=#00ffff>equip</color>.
Set equipment items to your <color=#00ffff>Favorite Equipment</color> and they will be <color=#00ffff>automatically equipped</color> during the Unit Formation phase.
The higher the <color=#00ffff>equipment proficiency</color>, the more easily you can draw out the <color=#00ffff>abilities</color> of your equipped items.
There are three types of equipment: <color=#00ffff>weapons</color>, <color=#00ffff>armor</color>, and <color=#00ffff>accessories</color>. Each type has its own equipment proficiency.
Proceed to a tutorial on Equipment?
